task.title: Create a Data Rule and Alert
task.shortdesc: The basic pipeline is basically complete. But let's create a data rule and alert. Data rules are user defined rules used to assess data moving through a stream or link between two stages.

context.p: The script in the Jython Evaluator sends records to error that were paid by credit card but don't have a credit card number associated with the record. But we can create a data rule and alert to let us know when the count reaches a specified threshold.

step.cmd: Select the link between the Stream Selector and the Jython Evaluator.
